description:
create security group raises HTTPForbidden on SecurityGroupLimitExceeded exception from nov-api server.
Because of that, novaclient raises Forbidden instead of OverLimit exception.
title: create security group raises HTTPForbidden on SecurityGroupLimitExceeded

comments.content:

Because of that, novaclient raises Forbidden instead of OverLimit exception.
